div.p: Ensemble mean Arctic ( a, b) and Tropical (c-d) ozone response to the Halog + SAD forcing experiment. ( a) April climatological column ozone. ( b) Column ozone anomalies averaged over April of post-eruption years 2–3. ( c) Annual mean climatological ozone. ( d) Anomalies averaged over post-eruption year 1 and 2.
